availability.name: Availability SLI
availability.description: Ratio of successful requests to total requests
availability.measurement_method: Count of good events divided by count of total events

latency.name: Latency SLI
latency.description: Proportion of requests completed within threshold
latency.measurement_method: Count of fast requests divided by total requests

freshness.name: Freshness SLI
freshness.description: Proportion of data updated within staleness threshold
freshness.measurement_method: Ratio of fresh data to total data
freshness.good_events: Data updated within acceptable staleness window (e.g., <5 minutes)

correctness.name: Correctness SLI
correctness.description: Proportion of data passing quality validation
correctness.measurement_method: Valid records divided by total records

throughput.name: Throughput SLI
throughput.description: Minimum events processed per time window
throughput.measurement_method: Events processed compared to minimum threshold
